rows.label: qst701101_msg0001
rows.name:
Hello, young lady. I am Arb.
I am retired now, but I used
to be a shipwright.

rows.label: qst701101_msg0002
rows.name:
This is sudden, but are you interested in
ships? My apprentice is building a ship, and
I was hoping you could lend him a hand.

rows.label: qst701101_msg0003
rows.name:
A ship, you say? I have to say
I haven't a clue, but we'd
love to help if we could...

rows.label: qst701101_msg0004
rows.name:
Fufufu, as I thought, "if
it helps people." What do
you wish for beyond that?

rows.label: qst701101_msg0005
rows.name:
Eh? I haven't really
thought about it... Why?

rows.label: qst701101_msg0006
rows.name:
Because the destiny you draw to yourself
changes depending on what you value and
what you are particular about.

rows.label: qst701101_msg0007
rows.name: Ugh, this is a difficult topic...

rows.label: qst701101_msg0008
rows.name:
Is it a story about howこだわり,
or attachment, brings not
only joy and prosperity?

rows.label: qst701101_msg0009
rows.name:
When you cling to things that are
already past and cannot be changed,
what is born is sadness.

rows.label: qst701101_msg0010
rows.name:
And that sometimes gives birth
to new sadness as well.

rows.label: qst701101_msg0011
rows.name:
Hoho, you have an interesting
way of thinking.

rows.label: qst701101_msg0012
rows.name:
I get what you're saying, but when
Wadatsumi, who is obsessed with Hugo,
says it, it gives me mixed feelings.

rows.label: qst701101_msg0013
rows.name:
Hmm, His Majesty is my everything,
so it's different from attachment.

rows.label: qst701101_msg0015
rows.name: Isn't it a mistake for overprotective?

rows.label: qst701101_msg0016
rows.name:
Everyone... let's not
interrupt the story.

rows.label: qst701101_msg0017
rows.name:
Anyway, young lady, I am interested
in what you will accomplish and what
you will create in the future.

rows.label: qst701101_msg0018
rows.name:
My apprentice, Wotta, has just returned to
the residential area. If you would be willing
to help, I would like you to visit him.

rows.label: qst701101_msg0019
rows.name:
But do not forget: for what
purpose, whom you help, and
where you yourself are headed.
